name: Evolution Simulator (SufDev)
description:
A simple Evolution Simulation

Downloading is recommended, because the HTML version has worse performance and can't render the graphs.

Controls:

Arrow Up/Down - Change iterations per second

Hold Alt  to change in bigger steps, hold Shift  to change in smaller steps

G - Toggle Graph

P/Enter - Pause Simulation

Tab - Toggle Average Genome Display

S - Toggle Custom Creature Menu

Scroll to change zoom

Hold Middle Mouse Button to move camera

Left Click on Creature - Focus/Show individual genome

Right Click - Spawn custom creature

Made with Godot
